testcase.brief: Check dhcp pkts forwarding with vlan 1 and check the PC station pkts forwarding
testcase.description:
Topology to use Switch | PC++++BR++++AP----station
Description: Check dhcp pkts forwarding with vlan 1 and check the PC station pkts forwarding [add step5/6 for bug29462] Pre-condition: PC1 connect to switch AP connect to lan ports eth2 BR lan port eth2 works with trunk mode Test procedure: 1. BR create dhcp server mgt0.x with vlan 10,20,30 2. BR lan port eth2 trunk mode, native-vlan 20, allow all 3. AP mgt0 vlan1, native-vlan 30 4. Enable AP mgt0 dhcp client to get ip address Result1 5. Station bind upid with vlan 10, PC connect with BR access port with vlan 10 6. Check PC ping station Result2 Expect result: Result1: AP mgt0 can get ip address from BR mgt0 vlan 1 Result2: PC ping station successfully.

step.desc: show BR interface mgt0
get IP address of BR mgt0
get prefix of AP mgt0 ip address
BR create dhcp server mgt0.x for vlan ${br1.vpc1.vlan},${br1.vpc2.vlan},${br1.vpc3.vlan}
step.telnet: -v "interface mgt0.1 vlan ${br1.vlan1}" -v "interface mgt0.1 ip ${br1.br.mgt0.1.ip}/${br.lan.netmask}" -v "interface mgt0.1 dhcp-server ip-pool ${br1.br.mgt0.1.ip_pool_start} ${br1.br.mgt0.1.ip_pool_end}" -v "interface mgt0.1 dhcp-server options netmask 255.255.255.0" -v "interface mgt0.1 dhcp-server options default-gateway ${br1.br.mgt0.1.ip}" -v "interface mgt0.1 dhcp-server options dns1 ${pub.dns1.ip}" -v "interface mgt0.1 dhcp-server enable" -v "" -v "interface mgt0.2 vlan ${br1.vlan2}" -v "interface mgt0.2 ip ${br1.br.mgt0.2.ip}/${br.lan.netmask}" -v "interface mgt0.2 dhcp-server ip-pool ${br1.br.mgt0.2.ip_pool_start} ${br1.br.mgt0.2.ip_pool_end}" -v "interface mgt0.2 dhcp-server options netmask 255.255.255.0" -v "interface mgt0.2 dhcp-server options default-gateway ${br1.br.mgt0.2.ip}" -v "interface mgt0.2 dhcp-server options dns1 ${pub.dns1.ip}" -v "interface mgt0.2 dhcp-server enable" -v "" -v "interface mgt0.3 vlan ${br1.vlan3}" -v "interface mgt0.3 ip ${br1.br.mgt0.3.ip}/${br.lan.netmask}" -v "interface mgt0.3 dhcp-server ip-pool ${br1.br.mgt0.3.ip_pool_start} ${br1.br.mgt0.3.ip_pool_end}" -v "interface mgt0.3 dhcp-server options netmask 255.255.255.0" -v "interface mgt0.3 dhcp-server options default-gateway ${br1.br.mgt0.3.ip}" -v "interface mgt0.3 dhcp-server options dns1 ${pub.dns1.ip}" -v "interface mgt0.3 dhcp-server enable"

step.desc: BR lan port eth3 trunk mode , native-vlan is ${br1.vlan3}, allow all
step.telnet: -v "interface eth3 mode bridge-802.1q" -v "interface eth3 native-vlan ${br1.vlan3}" -v "interface eth3 allowed-vlan all"

step.desc: port-config table shows native-vlan, vlan-table shows allow-vlan list for eth3 port correctly
show lan vlan-table
Configure AP mgt0 vlan is default vlan 1, native-vlan is ${br1.vpc1.vlan}
eanble mgt0 dhcp client to get ip address
step.console: -v "no interface mgt0 dhcp client" -v "" -v "" -v "interface mgt0 dhcp client" -v "" -v ""

step.desc: show AP interface mgt0
get IP address of ap1 mgt0
get prefix of AP mgt0 ip address
check ap mgt0 retrieve ip address from BR mgt0 dhcp server successfully
step.script: if [ "${br1.mgt0.prefix}" == "${br1.ap1.mgt0.prefix}" ]; then exit 0; else exit 1; fi

step.desc: BR lan port eth1 access mode ,vlan is ${br1.vlan1}
step.telnet: -v "interface eth1 mode bridge-access" -v "user-profile ${br1.vpc1.vlan} vlan ${br1.vpc1.vlan} attribute ${br1.vpc1.vlan}" -v "interface eth1 mode bridge-access user-profile-attribute ${br1.vpc1.vlan}"

step.desc: PC connect to BR port eth1, and PC get ip address
get ip address of br1.vpc1
get prefix of vpc1/vpc4/ap1.mgt0 ip address
check if vpc1 retrieve ip address from BR mgt0.1 dhcp server successfully
step.script: if [ "${br1.vpc1.ip.prefix}" == "${br1.mg0.1.prefix}" ]; then exit 0; else exit 1; fi

step.desc: config ssid on AP, the ssid bind upid with vlan ${br1.vpc1.vlan}
step.console: -v "security-object ap-sta" -v "security-object ap-sta default-user-profile-attr ${br1.vpc1.vlan}" -v "ssid ${conn1.ssid}" -v "ssid ${conn1.ssid} security-object ap-sta" -v "interface wifi0 ssid ${conn1.ssid}" -v "interface wifi1 ssid ${conn1.ssid}" -v "user-profile ${br1.vpc1.vlan} qos-policy def-user-qos vlan-id ${br1.vpc1.vlan} attribute ${br1.vpc1.vlan}" -v "" -v "show running-config" -v "" -v "show interface"

step.desc: create config file of wpa_supplicant
start wpa_supplicant
station connect to br1.ap1
check if the station was associated to br1.ap1 successfully
station gets IP by dhclient
ifconfig to show the ip add
Get station's mac
Get station's ip
show station on AP to check vlan info
PC ping AP connected station
